docs.title: WELCOME TO ALICE DOCUMENTATION TEST
docs.text: Adventures for Learning and Inspiring Coding Excellence

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text:
This document is a test page of all mkdocs possibilities. As a short ref, remember that mkdocs allows you to:

  • mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Figures
docs.text:
Inclusion of figures require

![Repositories](repositories-light.png#only-light){ width="70%" }
![Repositories](repositories-dark.png#only-dark){ width="70%" }
<br>**Figure 4** - *Repositories*
{ .figure }

Images for dark theme are prepared as follows:

  1. Export image from excalidraw in dark mode with no background.
  2. Run the following command:
convert -background '#22252a' -flatten input.png output.png

The result is shown in Figure 1.

Figure 1 - Repositories

docs.text:

This Abstract has no title

Tip

Collapsible Tip initially expanded

Success

Success

Question

Question

Warning

Warning

Failure

Danger

Danger

Bug

Bug

Example

Example

Quote

Quote

docs.title: Inline admonitions
docs.text:
!!! Info inline end "Comment here"
      This is the package specification

  ```ada title="package.ads"
  package The_Package is
    pragma pure;
  end The_Package;

  ```

Produces:

Comment here

This is the package specification

package.ads
package The_Package is
pragma pure;
end The_Package;

docs.title: Code blocks
docs.text:
My first program
procedure Main is
begin
null; -- (1)!
end Main;
  1. This is a note

docs.title: Ada example
Bash example
docs.text:
git clone
cd docs
git pull --all --tags --force  # (1)!
  1. Tags can change on the remote site.

Now bash:

#!python hl lines="1 3"
ls -la
tree /
ls -l /

docs.text:

docs/

    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Definitions
docs.text:
My Frist item Fugiuntque rogat postquam Tantalus austri thalamosque terret. Speciem illa a rumor muneribusque cuncta quibus quoque? Torque sub dulcique revolat, pro ad, Baucis somniferam? Modo Cecropidum quae nec, poma caelum neve dedit tremulaeque pennis. Second item Quibus cupressus utere addidit? Est alas esse tunicasque vigor traiectum nomen: plus damno: ipsa tum, ex. Aliquis mearum consuerant militia, tabe est inde a ut et illa. Formidine nobis; acta collo dedere ira alba munere ferrum, flagrat dato; montesque roboris intrat perdidit illa. Third item In PEFA we believe in CE.
